mapper.insert: insert into recruit(recu_go_num, recu_content, recu_due, recu_type, recu_topic, recu_target, recu_count, recu_required, recu_preferred, recu_online, recu_interview) values(#{group}, #{recruit.recu_content}, #{recruit.recu_due}, #{recruit.recu_type}, #{recruit.recu_topic}, #{recruit.recu_target}, #{recruit.recu_count}, #{recruit.recu_required}, #{recruit.recu_preferred}, #{recruit.recu_online}, #{recruit.recu_interview})
